description:
In this course I have tried to make students up and running in workflow of Ms-Powerpoint whithout going through any lengthy or complex process of learning students will experience quick easy and comprehensive approach teaching.  

This course will also enable students to get more benefit from other available training resources like they have a lot of information available all over the internet bet for getting benefit from all that information it is essential to have good understanding of basics, which they will get through this course.

By following all lessons students will be able to quickly start working on there presentation projects, from planing to designing and sharing it with others.
title: A Beginners Guide to Microsoft-Powerpoint in 30 minutes
instructors: Islamic Academy of Communication Arts Islamic Academy of Communication Arts
